channel.title: Home Server on David Araújo
channel.description: Recent content in Home Server on David Araújo

item.title: Homeless Self Hosting
item.description: Table of contents As specific as it is simple I needed a coach All hail Apps Script The Architecture: No Server, No Problem The ‘Secret Sauce’: Gemini 2.5 Pro Conclusion: The Environment is the Message Project page Like usual, you can find all documents and code here Has specific as it is simple Link to heading In this cookie-cutter world, we have managed to make ourselves fit in whatever shape fits the majority.

item.title: Router Annoyances
item.description: Table of contents My router suffers from amnesia Exploring my options More interesting than I imagined Developing a solution Setting and forgetting Project page Like usual, you can find all documents and code here My router suffers from amnesia Link to heading Of course I have a home server. Like probably most people who read this blog (if there are any of you out there!), I like to self-host some services.
